column4: anybody familiar with remastersys? or rebuilding the live/install iso? if so i need to do something rather odd and need a little help
I'd like to remove the "ubuntu" user from a live CD remaster? does anyone know if this can even be done?

<Flannel> True'nuff, yet I can't seem to find a way to get rid of it. though i did make the account a little less useful. ( which is a good thing / broke the "ubuntu" users sudo ability ) I'd like it to not boot into it though
find passwd file and remove the line with the user.
